data.title: Petition · Keep FOX Sports Networks

data.text:
Starting on November 1, DirecTV will no longer carry FX, FSN, SPEED, National Geographic Channel, FOX Soccer, FOX Soccer Plus, FOX Deportes, FUEL TV and Fox Movie Channel.

____________________________________________________________

What's Happening?

Despite Fox Networks’ offer of an extension during our ongoing negotiations, DirecTV has informed us and their customers that unless we agree to their demands, they “will suspend our networks on November 1.”

DirecTV sent us a proposal on Tuesday afternoon. They have given us no chance to respond before taking an unnecessarily aggressive posture and going public. It is disappointing that they have chosen bad faith tactics over meaningful negotiation.

We have proposed to keep the Fox Networks on DirecTV for the same price, and on the same terms as they are currently carried while we attempt to work out a fair agreement. Unfortunately, DirecTV has decided that unless they get their way, they are going to pull the plug on their customers.

DirecTV’s current agreement ends on November 1 and they have informed us that they will drop some of America’s most popular networks — FOX Sports Networks (and our 19 regional sports networks), FX, SPEED, National Geographic Channel, FOX Soccer, FOX Soccer Plus, FOX Deportes, FUEL TV and Fox Movie Channel.

The 19 FOX Sports Regional Networks include:

FOX Sports Arizona

FOX Sports Carolinas

FOX Sports Detroit

FOX Sports Florida

FOX Sports Houston

FOX Sports Indiana

FOX Sports Kansas City

FOX Sports Midwest

FOX Sports North

FOX Sports Ohio

FOX Sports Oklahoma

FOX Sports Southwest

FOX Sports South

FOX Sports Tennessee

FOX Sports West

FOX Sports Wisconsin

Prime Ticket

SportSouth

Sun Sports

Plus, soon, you could lose the following local FOX stations:

Atlanta : WAGA – FOX 5

Austin : KTVC – FOX 7

Baltimore My Network TV WUTB – 24

Boston WFXT – FOX 25

Chicago WFLD – Fox Chicago

Chicago My Network TV WPWR – 50

Dallas : KDFW – FOX 4, My Network TV KDFI – 27

Detroit : WJBK – FOX 2

Gainesville : WOGX – FOX 51

Houston : KRIV – FOX 26, My Network TV KTXH – 27

Los Angeles : KTTV – FOX 11, My Network TV KCOP – 13

Memphis : WHBQ – FOX 13

Minneapolis : KMSP – FOX 9, My Network TV WFTC – FOX 29

New York WNYW – FOX 5

New York My Network TV WWOR – 9

Orlando : WOFL – FOX 35, My Network TV WRVW – 65

Phoenix : KSAZ – FOX 10, My Network TV KUTP – FOX 45

Tampa : WTVT – FOX 13

Washington D.C. WTTG – FOX 5

Washington D.C. My Network TV WDCA – 20
